channel.title: Mediagazer
channel.description: Top news and commentary for media professionals from all around the web

item.title: 2021年4月のマーシャル火災の後に生まれたコロラド州のポップアップ・コミュニティ・ニュースルームの様子。ハワイ、マサチューセッツ、カナダの取り組みに似ている（Stacy Feldman/RJI）
item.description:
Stacy Feldman / RJI:
A look at the Colorado pop-up community newsroom that emerged after the Marshall Fire in April 2021, resembling efforts in Hawaii, Massachusetts, and Canada  —  We're building a guide to help newsrooms fill voids in deep-dive reporting with their communities

item.title: UMG、ソニー・ミュージックなどのレーベルがインターネット・アーカイブを著作権侵害で提訴、「グレート78プロジェクト」は楽曲の「違法レコード店」だと主張（Blake Brittain/Reuters）
item.description:
Blake Brittain / Reuters:
UMG, Sony Music, and other labels sue the Internet Archive for copyright infringement, saying the “Great 78 Project” is an “illegal record store” for songs  —  Universal Music Group (UMG.AS), Sony Music Entertainment (6758.T) and other record labels on Friday sued …

item.title: グーグル、マイクロソフト、アマゾンを含むハリウッド・プロフェッショナル・アソシエーションは、AMPTP、WGA、SAG-AFTRAに対し、早急にストライキの解決策を見出すよう要請（Lucas Manfredi/The Wrap）
item.description:
Lucas Manfredi / The Wrap:
The Hollywood Professional Association, which includes Google, Microsoft, and Amazon, urges the AMPTP, the WGA, and SAG-AFTRA to find a strike resolution soon  —  “Organizations indispensable to the creation of media are cutting staff... and in some cases, even risk closing,” the Hollywood Professional Association writes

item.title: イリノイ州で、16歳未満のインフルエンサーと、インフルエンサーの子供たちに収益の一定割合を与えるという、子どもインフルエンサーを保護する米国初の法律が成立（Fortesa Latifi/Teen Vogue）
item.description:
Fortesa Latifi / Teen Vogue:
Illinois passes the US' first law protecting child influencers, entitling influencers under age 16 and featured kids of influencers to a percentage of earnings  —  Illinois has officially passed the nation's first legislation aimed at protecting child influencers, in a move advocates …

item.title: マリオン郡レコード紙が批判的な記事を掲載した後、警察は地元判事の許可を得て同紙の事務所と発行人の自宅を家宅捜索し、機材を押収した（Sherman Smith/Kansas Reflector）。
item.description:
Sherman Smith / Kansas Reflector:
Police raided the Marion County Record's office, authorized by a local judge, and the publisher's home, seizing equipment after the paper ran a critical article  —  Eric Meyer, publisher of the Marion County Record, answers questions in his newspaper office Friday after police seized computers, servers, cellphones and other items.

item.title: WGAとAMPTPの代表が金曜日に会談、情報源：会談は以前の会談よりも生産的で、両者は8月15日に再度会談する予定（Wendy Lee/Los Angeles Times）
item.description:
Wendy Lee / Los Angeles Times:
Representatives for the WGA and AMPTP met on Friday; source: the talks were more productive than the earlier meeting, and the sides plan to meet again August 15  —  Negotiators for film and TV writers met with studio representatives on Friday afternoon, a step that could represent …

item.title: NBCユニバーサルが、バーやレストランなどの商業施設にピーコックの独占ライブ・スポーツ・コンテンツを配信する複数年契約を結ぶ（Anthony Crupi/Sportico）
item.description:
Anthony Crupi / Sportico:
NBCUniversal signs a multiyear deal to let EverPass distribute Peacock's exclusive live sports content to bars, restaurants, and other commercial establishments  —  The financial terms underpinning the multiyear pact were not disclosed.  —  The partnership will serve to expose Peacock's …

item.title: ロン・デサンティス陣営は、クーリエ・ニュースルームのアイオワ・スターティング・ラインの記者2人を、金曜日のアイオワの選挙イベントから締め出した。
item.description:
Ty Rushing / Iowa Starting Line:
Ron DeSantis' campaign bars two reporters of Courier Newsroom's Iowa Starting Line from an Iowa campaign event on Friday; no other media outlets were excluded  —  Gov. Ron DeSantis' campaign team today contacted law enforcement in an attempt to prohibit Iowa Starting Line reporters from covering …

item.title: フォックス社の最高法務・政策責任者であるベト・ディン氏は、7億8750万ドルのドミニオン社との和解後、2023年12月31日に退任し、フォックス社の顧問になる予定だ（Anthony Lin/Bloomberg）
item.description:
Anthony Lin / Bloomberg:
Fox Corp's chief legal and policy officer, Viet Dinh, plans to step down on December 31, 2023, and become a Fox adviser, after the $787.5M Dominion settlement  —  - Viet Dinh is departing as Fox chief legal and policy officer  — Fox paid $787.5 million to settle suit over vote-fraud claims

item.title: アラメダ元CEOキャロライン・エリソンの日記をNYTに公開するなど、証人への改ざんを司法省に告発されたSBFの保釈を取り消す米判事（Luc Cohen/Reuters）
item.description:
Luc Cohen / Reuters:
A US judge revokes SBF's bail after the DOJ accused him of tampering with witnesses, such as by sharing former Alameda CEO Caroline Ellison's diary with the NYT  —  Sam Bankman-Fried's bail was revoked ahead of his October fraud trial, a U.S. judge said on Friday, after prosecutors accused …

item.title: 小規模ストリーミングサービスのバンドル、バンドルにおける通信会社の潜在的役割、同じユーザーインターフェイスを共有することに反対する大手ストリーミングサービス（Josef Adalian/Vulture）
item.description:
Josef Adalian / Vulture:
A look at bundles from smaller streaming services, telcos' potential role in bundling, and big streaming services' opposition to sharing the same user interface  —  This story first ran in Buffering, Vulture's newsletter about the streaming industry.  Head to vulture.com/buffering and subscribe today!

item.title: 国税庁がVice Media Groupの破産訴訟で、Refinery29は米国政府に4,090万ドルの裏金、利子、違約金を支払う義務があるとして請求書を提出（Todd Spangler/Variety）
item.description:
Todd Spangler / Variety:
The IRS files a claim in Vice Media Group's bankruptcy case saying that Refinery29 owes the US government ~$40.9M in back taxes, interest, and penalties  —  A rep for Vice Media Group did not immediately respond to a request for comment on the IRS claim.  Vice Media completed the acquisition …

item.title: TMZ、Insider、Los Angeles Timesなどの大手メディアは、子ラッパーのリル・テイとその弟の死亡疑惑に関する報道を撤回せざるを得なくなった（アンジェラ・ヤン/NBC News）
item.description:
Angela Yang / NBC News:
Major outlets including TMZ, Insider, and the Los Angeles Times had to walk back their reporting about the alleged death of child rapper Lil Tay and her brother  —  A post on Lil Tay's Instagram account announced her death.  A day later, it was removed.  —  Lil Tay's life has always been shocking …

item.title: X、広告収入分配の対象基準を過去3ヶ月の1500万インプレッションから500万インプレッションに引き下げ、マスク氏「認証されたハンドルネームからの閲覧のみカウント」（Ivan Mehta/TechCrunch）
item.description:
Ivan Mehta / TechCrunch:
X lowers its eligibility threshold for ad revenue sharing from 15M to 5M impressions in the past three months; Musk: “only views from verified handles count”  —  Elon Musk-owned social network X, formerly Twitter, said late Thursday that it is lowering requirements for its creator payout program.

item.title: FCバルセロナは、コンテンツ制作部門であるバルサ・メディアのナスダック上場を2023年第4四半期に計画している。
item.description:
Georgi Azar / Bloomberg:
FC Barcelona plans to list its content creation unit Barca Media on the Nasdaq in Q4 2023 via a $1B SPAC merger, 80% owned by existing Barca Media shareholders  —  Spanish football's FC Barcelona will list its content creation unit Barca Media in the US via a merger with a special purpose acquisition company …
